mapper.select: /* selectCompInfo */ SELECT IFNULL(TEC.COMP_SEQ, '') AS compSeq, IFNULL(TEC.PARENT_COMP_SEQ, '') AS parentCompSeq, IFNULL(TEC.COMP_NAME, '') AS compName, IFNULL(TEC.USE_YND, '') AS useYnd, DATE_FORMAT(TEC.CREATE_DATE, '%Y%m%d%H%i') AS createDate, IFNULL(TEC.CREATE_SEQ, '') AS createSeq, CASE WHEN TEC.MODIFY_DATE IS NOT NULL THEN DATE_FORMAT(TEC.MODIFY_DATE, '%Y%m%d%H%i') ELSE '' END AS modifyDate, IFNULL(TEC.MODIFY_SEQ, '') AS modifySeq FROM T_EM_COMP TEC WHERE 1 = 1 AND TEC.COMP_SEQ = #{comp.compSeq} AND TEC.USE_YND = 'Y'
